```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(gdtools)
```

`gdtools` let R users get informations about the fonts available on their system.

## System fonts

The first function is `sys_fonts`, it returns a detailed list of informations about the font that can be found on your system:

```{r}
my_sys_fonts <- sys_fonts()
head(my_sys_fonts)
```

> Note that for Windows users, a first usage could drive to a long run (a file fonts.conf containing configuration informations for the fontconfig library will be read and fontconfig will then scan your font directories).

## Check font name

`font_family_exists` will check if a font family exists in system fonts :

```{r}
font_family_exists("Arial")
font_family_exists("dummy_fontname")
```
